name: sbid2v
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), w0)

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)

|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: An identity law for substitution. Used in proof of Theorem 9.7 of [Megill] p. 449 (p. 16 of the preprint). (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
